## formatIfNumber() function

Returns a formatted string for a number, otherwise returns the original value

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function formatIfNumber(value: Value): string | Value;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | Value |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

string \| Value
